Posts.Content: Hi, My sister in law just told us that she tested positive for BOTH BRAC1 and BRAC2 mutations. Is this possible? All the info I have read on the net seems to say BRCA1 or BRCA2 mutations, but never really mentions both. Thanks for any info.
Posts.Title: BRCA1 and BRCA2
